name: Macro Foxes and Wolves
description:
Here is a Dreambooth checkpoint I created on a few macro images.

Pros:

Can do vixens, wolves, and some pokemon. I haven't really tried anything else so do send results.

Understands the term macro

decent city backgrounds

With some prompting it can make very detailed art

Cons:

Can't generate space very well.

Hard to prompt futa's in, but it is possible.

only really trained on women

Hard to prompt it to put subject in the area (sometimes it generates inside or on a rooftop/balcony)

Has a hard time putting tail in right place.
